data.title: Richard Attenborough (1810-1888)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Richard Attenborough born 1810 Titchmarsh, Northamptonshire, England, United Kingdom died 1888 Farcet, Huntingdonshire, England, United Kingdom including research + descendants + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Son of [father unknown] and [mother unknown]

[sibling(s) unknown]

Descendants

Profile last modified 26 Dec 2023

This page has been accessed 37 times.

Biography

Richard was born in 1810. He passed away in 1888.

In the 1841 census Richard (age 30) was in Sawtry St Judith, Huntingdonshire, England.[1]

Name Sex Age Occupation Birth Place Richard Attenborough M 30 Farmer Mary Ann Bosmorth F 25 F. Servant Charles Martin M 20 M. Servant Huntingdonshire, England Charles King M 15 M. Servant

Richard, son of John Attenborough, married Martha Bletsoe in 1845 in Saint Nicholas, Brighton, Sussex, England.[2]

In the 1851 census Richard (age 40) was the head of household in Sawtry St Judith, Huntingdonshire, England.[3]

Name Relation Status Sex Age Occupation Birth Place Richard Attenborough Head M 40 Farmer of 570 acres, employing 25 labourers Titchmarsh, Northamptonshire, England Patsy Attenborough Daughter F 5 Sawtry, Huntingdonshire, England Virtue Attenborough Daughter F 3 Banwell, Northamptonshire, England Mary Dudley Housekeeper F 25 Titchmarsh, Northamptonshire, England John Alsbon Norton Visitor M 28 Farmer of 168 acres employing 8 labourers Sawtry St Andrew, Huntingdonshire, England Charlotte Gales Servant F 18 Tansor, Northamptonshire, England Mary Chancy Servant F 16 Sawtry, Huntingdonshire, England Francis Kirsley Servant M 24 Bolnhurst, Bedfordshire, England John Newbury Servant M 21 Oundle, Northamptonshire, England Joseph Warner Servant M 16 Sawtry, Huntingdonshire, England

Richard (full age), son of John Attenborough, married Mary Dudley on 22 April 1853 in Titchmarsh, Northamptonshire, England.[4]

In the 1861 census Rich (age 50) was the head of household in Sawtry St Judith, Huntingdonshire, England.[5]

Name Relation Status Sex Age Occupation Birth Place Rich Attenborough Head M 50 Farmer 940 acres Titchmarsh, Northamptonshire, England Mary Attenborough Wife F 39 Titchmarsh, Northamptonshire, England Patty Attenborough Daughter F 15 Sawtry, Huntingdonshire, England Virtue Attenborough Daughter F 13 Barnwell, Northamptonshire, England Mary Attenborough Daughter F 6 Sawtry, Huntingdonshire, England Elizabeth M Attenborough Daughter F 4 Sawtry, Huntingdonshire, England Alice Attenborough Daughter F 3 Sawtry, Huntingdonshire, England Annie Attenborough Daughter F 1 Sawtry, Huntingdonshire, England Hannah Fountan Servant F 26 Sawtry, Huntingdonshire, England Eliza Ayres Servant F 15 Sawtry, Huntingdonshire, England Geo Perkins Servant M 18 Bythorne, Huntingdonshire, England Geo Prate Servant M 15 Colnworth, Bedfordshire, England

In the 1871 census Richard (age 60) was the head of household in Sawtry, Sawtry St Judith, Huntingdonshire, England.[6]

Name Relation Status Sex Age Occupation Birth Place Richard Attenborough Head M 60 Farmer of about 1000 acres employing 2 carpenters, 26 men, 13 boys, 2 women 17 girls, Landowner and Goldsmith & Pawnbroker Agent and Appraiser Titchmarsh, Northamptonshire, England Mary Attenborough Wife F 49 Titchmarsh, Northamptonshire, England Patty Attenborough Daughter F 25 Sawtry Huntingdonshire England Alice Attenborough Daughter F 14 Sawtry Huntingdonshire England Thomas Attenborough Son M 2 Sawtry Huntingdonshire England Fanny Coles Servant F 27 Molesworth, Huntingdonshire, England Eliza Newbon Servant F 21 Easton Huntingdonshire England Patty Yates Servant F 15 Sawtry Huntingdonshire England James Jolley Servant M 30 Buckworth Huntingdonshire England William Adolphus Mitchell Servant M 16 Sawtry Huntingdonshire England

In the 1881 census Richd (age 71), Farmer Of 960 Acres Employing 25 Men One Woman & 9 Boys, was the married head of household in Mr Attenboroughs Residence, Sawtry St Judith, Huntingdonshire, England.[7]

Name Relation Status Sex Age Occupation Birth Place Richd. Attenborough Head Married M 71 Farmer Of 960 Acres Employing 25 Men One Woman & 9 Boys Titchmarsh, Northamptonshire, England Mary Attenborough Wife Married F 59 Titchmarsh, Northamptonshire, England Elizh.Mary Attenborough Daughter F 24 Sawtry, Huntingdon, England Richd.John Attenborough Son M 19 Farmers Son Sawtry, Huntingdon, England Deborah Parker Servant F 21 Cook & Dairy Maid Alconbury, Huntingdon, England Emma Payne Servant F 16 Housemaid Sawtry, Huntingdon, England Mary Ann Ayres Servant F 14 Housemaid Sawtry, Huntingdon, England Charles Seward Servant M 17 Groom & Milk Boy (Dom) Leighton, Huntingdon, England

Richard died on 14 November 1888 in Huntingdonshire, England and his estate passed probate on 23 February 1889 in Peterborough.[8]
